Title: Review of the British Thoracic Society Winter Meeting 2016, 7-9 December, London, UK
Abstract: © Published by the BMJ Publishing Group Limited. For permission to use (where not already granted under a licence) please go to http://www.bmj.com/company/products-services/rights-and-licensing/.This article reviews the British Thoracic Society Winter Meeting 2016 and highlights the new developments in scientific and clinical research across the breadth of respiratory medicine.
